name: Devil's Offering
description:
Quick note, if the web game is blurry, you may need to readjust the window for it to snap back into a clear view. 

Devil's Offering is my first jam submission, and it was a blast to work on!

You are taken by the Devil to survive a 5 wave challenge, where the only goal is to survive! Fortunately, the Devil is kind enough to provide you with a 'phantom mode', allowing you to become untouched while it's on. Not only that, but you can destroy any ghosts you touch while in this mode.

However, there's a price. While phantom mode is active, you also slowly lose health. It's a good strategy to pick and choose when you enter phantom mode, as there will likely be times where you get cornered and will need to escape.

 You can also chat with the Devil before each wave. Whether it's listening to him have no faith in you, or possibly trying to bargain, there's a nice variety of content.

I hope you enjoy the game! It's short, but I'm proud of it. Oh yeah, and Happy Halloween everyone!
